component_a_cash_support.cash_evidence_citation: The multi-faceted interventions were delivered through a government-led national cash transfer programme

component_b_assets.assets_evidence_citation: the Full and Capital arms had relatively larger effects on livestock than the Psychosocial arm

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: Our findings show that three modalities of a multi-faceted intervention induced widespread improvements in consumption, revenues and psychosocial well-being
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: Our experimental design has two limitations

bonus_information.cost_mentions: Sustained effects were obtained at low cost, leading to considerably higher benefit-cost ratios than graduation programmes implemented by NGOs elsewhere
